entry.title: Armenia reports 1 soldier killed by Azerbaijani fire

media:group.media:title: Armenia reports 1 soldier killed by Azerbaijani fire
media:group.media:description:
๐Armeniaโs Defense Ministry said one soldier was killed by Azerbaijani fire in the eastern Gegharkunik region. Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Nagorno-Karabakh all reported ceasefire violations in the past day. ๐The International Committee of the Red Cross evacuated seven people from Nagorno-Karabakh to Armenia for urgent medical treatment, according to Nagorno-Karabakhโs Health Ministry. ๐Armeniaโs Human Rights Defenderโs Office opened an investigation into the murder of a trans woman in Yerevan. The police have arrested one person in connection with the killing.
Credits: Ruptly

entry.title: Maple Syrup to Apricots: Nation Building Through Business

media:group.media:title: Maple Syrup to Apricots: Nation Building Through Business
media:group.media:description:
Levon Nazarian left a successful real estate business in Canada and the USA to move to Armenia and begin a property investing business, and contribute to the country's future. In this episode, Levon shares his journey from the promise of an Armenian dream to the realities and challenges of doing business, the hidden opportunities to success, and his path to nation building in Armenia.

media:group.media:title: ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีึีซีฃีธีชีซีถ ีกีณีฅึีถีฅีฌีธึ ึีกีถีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีฏีก. ีีธึึีฅีถ ีีธึึีฅีถีตีกีถึ
media:group.media:description:
ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีบีกีตึีกึ ีง ีฅึีฅึ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีปึ, ีธึีธีถึีซึ ีฅึีฏีธึีฝีจี ิฑึีกีตีซีฏ ีีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีตีกีถีจ ึ ีีธึีขีฅีถ ีีกึีคีกีถีตีกีถีจ, ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฐีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกึึีธึีด ีคีซึึีธึีธีทีธึีด ีนีธึีถีฅีถ, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ยซิดีฅีดีธีฏึีกีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีกีตีฌีจีถีฟึีกีถึยป ีฏีธึีฝีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ีีธึึีฅีถ ีีธึึีฅีถีตีกีถึีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ิตึึีธึีคีจ ีีกีดีพีฅีฌ ิฒีกีขีกีตีกีถีถ ีง, ีธึีจ, ีีธึึีฅีถีตีกีถึีซ ีฏีกึีฎีซึีธีพ, ีดีซีกีฏีถ ีง, ีธึ ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฐีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฏีกึีฃีกีพีธึีดีกีถ ีฐีกึึีธึีด ีคีซึึีธึีธีทีธึีด ีธึีถีซ, ีฉีฅีบีฅีฟ ีกีตีถ ีญีธึีฅีฌีซ ีง: ีีฟีฅีฒีฎีพีกีฎ ีฎีกีถึ ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏีจ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีฅีฌีธึ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีธีพ ิฑึีกีตีซีฏ ีีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีตีกีถีจ, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ีีธึึีฅีถีตีกีถึีจ, ีฏีซึีกีผีธึีด ีง ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึี ีจีถีคีฐีธึีบ ีธึีชีกีตีซีถ ีณีถีทีธึีดีจ:
